Beta 1.0 : This version only support Qualcomm Platform
Beta 1.1 : This version adds force FTM for MTK platform, but SIMLock funciton doesn't support on MTK platform.
version 1.0: 
  1. Add MTK SIMLock function
  2. Add reboot device function 
version 1.1:
  1. Fixed MTK platform Open port fail for first time execution.
  2. Fixed MTK SIM Lock command.
version 1.2:
  1. Add SIM Lockk Status
  2. Fixed the unlock code length
  3. add debug log at c:\LogData\NokiaSIMLock\ folder
